channel.title: CVE Feed for Siretta -- QUARTZ-GOLD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siretta -- QUARTZ-GOLD

item.title: CVE-2022-40701|2024-08-01T17:46:55.181Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the httpd delfile.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file deletion. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-41154|2024-08-01T13:42:00.822Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the m2m DELETE_FILE cmd functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary file deletion. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-38088|2024-08-01T13:59:24.393Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the httpd downfile.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file read. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-38451|2024-08-01T16:11:32.129Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the httpd update.cgi functionality of FreshTomato 2022.5. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file read. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-39045|2024-08-01T18:40:36.649Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A file write vulnerability exists in the httpd upload.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file upload. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-38715|2024-08-01T13:56:10.863Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A leftover debug code vulnerability exists in the httpd shell.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-36279|2024-08-01T14:03:42.741Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the httpd delfile.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-42484|2024-08-01T14:11:50.197Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the httpd logs/view.cgi functionality of FreshTomato 2022.5. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.
